findings.title: Out of gas exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long. The function _getCurrentSupply also uses a loop for evaluating total supply and can also be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long excluded addresses list.
